name: New Hope
description:
For millennia you have drifted through space to finally arrive at your destination; a new world! A new beautiful luscious world lies in front of you, what are you waiting for? Let's build up your new home!

Game Jam Theme: You only realize the value of something when it's gone.

This is an idle incremental clicker game created for the B&W Jam. You click with the mouse to earn cash which you spend on buildings to earn even more cash.

Music: A New Beginning by https://www.bensound.com/

Sound: Mixkit https://mixkit.co/

Created: 15-16th of April for the B&W Jam
